I want much of the Muppets series tbh. https://t.co/WjrACHPg5P

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: I got Goth MILF vibes on this fine Monday, hbu? https://t.co/I6RJc8mTBp

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: I’d be a subsistence Gardener or maybe I could be part of an end-of-life-with-dignity care team. Or a write or artist, I guess. https://t.co/YRKTwcAcTG

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text:
Whew, I am feeling better after taking out some trash last week. Life is Feeling Lighter and less-cluttered! 
What a productive, cleansing, and powerful eclipse season!

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Tebuchet vs catapult? Nah, get you an army that has both. Both is good!

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Hey! I just realized I’m going to save so much gas $ by no longer having a crush! (My ex-crush lived in the mountains)

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: I feel like relationship anarchy is maybe not actually my thing but I also feel like that disappoints some of my friends/allies, who see me as a open-minded and liberated person. However, I’ve got to admit to myself that I like a little bit of escalation

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: A big ass raccoon climbed over my cinder-block back fence like 5 min later! So stressful. But I growled ferociously and waved a broom while I threw an empty cereal box. Got ‘em!

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Some of y’all have never smoked weed in a hammock, and it shows.

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text:
Petty, petty, petty.
Pity, pity, pity!
Y’all need to grow up.

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Hey it’s absolutely normal to love hot air balloons and have absolutely no desire to ride in one.

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: @ kennedytcooper asked me if I wanted to get a pink streak to match their cool pink hair and I said no at first, cuz I like how healthy my hair is. Maybe I should reconsider. What do y’all think? https://t.co/ni8UxksbKp

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: My therapist is going to be glad to know I’ve been getting to bed earlier this week but they won’t necessarily like the reasons why. 🙄

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Ugh, this whole fucking experience has me feeling like a bad partner and a bad friend despite being told otherwise by partners and friends. I just want to wake up and have it all entirely behind us!

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Oooohhh! This reminds me I’m patiently waiting for my mantid egg case to hatch! Hopefully soon! https://t.co/xaQ9Gnlbc8

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: I slept in my @TheMidnightLA shirt and woke up at Sunset!

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Hi! Here is me being giggly and goofy in my boomer shirt with my denim bucket hat and my new collar! I’m giggly because of the collar. I get it put back on today (I’m not ready to wear it everyday yet, bcuz I pretend to be professional 🙃) Tell me I’m cute https://t.co/ozcVMlmgd1

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Ugh, even though I truly KNOW that I made the Best decision for myself, my lifestyle, my kiddo, and ALL my partners, this shit still really fucking sucks.I want to already let go move on and crap, but it’s hard to.

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text:
Wow, I have never in my life received a “break up” package by snail mail. 
But, I also wasn’t even dating said person who sent it, therefore can’t really call it a breakup. Js

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: It used to be I had to have others perpetuate my violence for me but now that I have bigger muscles,  I can perpetuate my own violence now.

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Only 2. I am so not a picky eater. https://t.co/hw5Rdx7Ijj

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: https://t.co/IlzVRITtC6 @kennedytcooper and he who is not among the TL, Elliot and beyond!

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Only negative thing about my day, so far!Covid negative test! https://t.co/tgubdIup7X

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Anyways, there are real-ass global issues that need my resources and attention. So imma focus on those since I know those are where my inner  personal stand, and I know my inner stances. My c-vid swab seems to be negative. I’m pumped. Bday celebrations soon!

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: I love this fae creature so dang much!!! https://t.co/WBiFIKahUN

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: I love DS9 best!!

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text:
Hey, share your  Star Trek races that  you I’d with! 
I’d be half-Bajoran , half-Cardassian,  like Ziyal. I absolutely and emphatically love plants and social justice, but I also love warm, warm temps and warm biomes and I can appreciate technology.

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Also, I have the BEST damn partners and metamours I could ever ask for!! Some  of you followers know Who you are and I love you! Yes, All of you! Even the burgeoning metamour!

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Haters wanna hate but I’m literally on a love cloud, looking at all the love and support around me. I am humbled, I am touched. https://t.co/ouPATxyAIi

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Up early after weirrrrd dreams. At least they weren’t scary. Well, maybe the guard ostrich for the factory in my dream was scary…

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: It’s a nu funk kind of morning. Tempted to dress funky fresh today but I’ll probably just  wear a sundress or a romper after I garden.

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Lots of things are closed on Mondays in our city so we are going today instead. https://t.co/MBKBbjxZ4e

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: My mid-week day is now called my mid-weekend off. XD

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Mm, I’m looking forward to therapy tomorrow. I have so much positivity to share, some minor things to work on and some attempts at habit changes to report on (I haven’t done well with putting my phone down earlier before bed, for instance.

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Should I hex my neighbor that uses Round Up on their property which is on a residential street with at least 3 children living on it (oh, Round Up has chemicals which cause lymphoma, in case that’s important to know)?

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text:
Me to my neighbors (in my head) at 7:30am: is it to early to play trap in the backyard while I garden?
Also me, seconds later: bopping to Wyclef Jean by Young Thug while I prune a tree…

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Going to the sex shop later todayoday with my super cute cutie partner to have a very fun day! I can’t wait!

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: I forgot quotation marks in my previous tweet thread but oh well! That’s what happens when you e been up since3 am reading old memos/notes, blog post drafts, and digital diary entries. 🙄

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: If you’re ever feeling extreme guilt from your religious leaders for being who you are, remember that many of those beliefs in that religion are human-made. I want to you to feel less shame about who you are, because you are probably really unique and cool!

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Christianity doesn't nurture an individual's uniqueness and inherent good but instead heavily encourages conformity to a man-made ideal disguised as "the word of God." And berates a person for their imperfections of character.

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Found an old letter draft to my (now deceased) father that I had written after our final falling out. He had stormed away after learning my partner’s band performance was happening at a gay bar. I want to share it because maybe it will help others.

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: It is a dang ol miracle I got any cleaning and gardening done today but I did it, with the help of @kennedytcooper and a couple someones too cool for the bird app. Polyamory is solidarity!

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Not sure why I’m sooo fatigued today. It could be the only getting 4 1/2 hours of non-continuous sleep (full moon nights are difficult for sleeping) or it could be the curse of capitalism. Idk

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Yeah I’m solar charging my pendulum and tarot deck at a family event. So what? And later tonight I’m going to moon cleanse the deck and pendulum. What you gonna do?

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: Oh shiiittt!!! https://t.co/ob1IfmMJ67

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: I’m having sensory overload today and it’s not a convenient day for it At All, becuz I’m having a very social day today.

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: My heart is all fluttery with thoughts of how my weekend looks. Starting today after work!

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: I’ve been poly since 2015 and the first 4 years of that, I did  not know many in-person, local polyam folks. But that is not my reality anymore. Now I have connections that help me feel less shame and like I belong 💖

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text:
Sometimes polyamory is realizing you have built a web of accepting and supportive people whom are also partners/metamours/crushes. 
I’d long  felt like an outsider until more recent polyam connections were forged. Now I feel seen, supported, and hopeful!

author: Luvjunqi-of the 🏜
text: One of these days I hope I’ll find overalls at the thrift store that fit well. If manifestation is real, then it WILL happen one day!
